name: UpdateGlAccount
description: Update the name or code of a GL account.

parameters.name: gl_account_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the GL account to update. It must be a string.

parameters.name: gl_account_code
parameters.description: Code of the general ledger account. Provide an empty string to reset the code.

value_schema.description: code of the general ledger account; you could provide an empty string if you want to reset the code.

parameters.name: gl_account_name
parameters.description: The new name for the general ledger account.

value_schema.description: name of the general ledger account

parameters.name: reactivate_deleted_gl_account
parameters.description: Set to true to reactivate a deleted general ledger account. If false, the account remains inactive.

value_schema.description: reactivate a deleted general ledger account

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.
